mapper.sql: partner_id, operation_type, white_level, status, gmt_create, gmt_modify
mapper.select:
select
from partner_white_list where operation_type = #{operationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status = 1
mapper.insert:
insert into partner_white_list
partner_id,
operation_type,
white_level,
status,
gmt_create,
gmt_modify,
#{partnerId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{operationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{whiteLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.update:
update partner_white_list
white_level = #{whiteLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where partner_id = #{partnerId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and operation_type = #{operationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
